review.title: “Sales Consultant,”
review.pros: Pros – relaxed atmosphere and very nice co workers. I loved that we had group christmas parties and also were able to get discounted service through work.
review.cons: Cons – Very low pay comparable to other Sprint franchises. In addition to low pay there was not much opportunity for upward mobility. Responsibilities did not match pay.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Close down stores and pay your better sellers more. Company was too stretched out.

review.title: “Pay is good, customer issues and problems are constant, no room for advancement past team lead”
review.pros: Pros – Pay , hourly + commission and FT benefits are greatManagement is very understanding with balance of work and social life, request off's are usually granted.Free cell phone servicebonuses
review.cons: Cons – Managment plays favorites, people get ahead if you know the right peopleConstantly getting yelled at by customersphones are not the best quality and if they are they are outrageously pricedno possitive feedbackreviews are not given on time or at all
